title: Nahu Rindu
resume:
Everything changed when Kasyaf died on the way to her wedding with Nazira. Kasyaf blind mother does not know that the Mentri have already died. Obituaries Kasyaf kept secret by her own husband did not want his wife's health is affected.
Nazira who still can not forget Kasyaf go on vacation in a chalet with close friend Dina. One day, Nazira collided with Fateh identical Kasyaf . He began to fall in love but Fateh already married
